description: The Heisman Trophy winner writes about overcoming obstacles.
title: SHAKEN
author: Tim Tebow

description: A discussion between two spiritual leaders about how to find joy in the face of suffering.
title: THE BOOK OF JOY
author: the Dalai Lama and Desmond Tutu with Douglas Abrams

description: A strategy for reprogramming your mind so that you can reach new levels of achievement and purpose.
title: THINK BETTER, LIVE BETTER
author: Joel Osteen

description: A guide to conduct, spiritual freedom and a life with fewer limitations, by a Mexican healer. Originally published in 2000.
title: THE FOUR AGREEMENTS
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

description: The author examines the roots of rejection and how it can poison relationships, including one’s relationship with God.
title: UNINVITED
author: Lysa TerKeurst

description: How to soothe an aching heart or broken spirit through Christian faith.
title: THE BROKEN WAY
author: Ann Voskamp

description: The journey of a traveler and a spiritual teacher through a series of mysteries, which are also applied to daily challenges.
title: THE BOOK OF MYSTERIES
author: Jonathan Cahn

description: A woman’s path from "burned out on busy" to a life of grace, love, rest and play.
title: PRESENT OVER PERFECT
author: Shauna Niequist

description: A guide to personal growth and spiritual enlightenment. Originally published in 2002.
title: THE POWER OF NOW
author: Eckhart Tolle

description: An argument for divine providence in American history.
title: THE AMERICAN MIRACLE
author: Michael Medved
